t1.name: Anna M.
t1.testimonial: A charming place in Alp! The fresh pasta is spectacular and the service unbeatable. We'll be back for sure!
t1.title: Perfect for a getaway in La Cerdanya
t2.name: Charles P.
t2.testimonial: The artisan pizzas at La Ferradura are authentic. We tried the four cheese and loved it. Highly recommended.
t2.title: Authentic Italian flavors in Alp
t3.name: Laura G.
t3.testimonial: Very attentive service and a place with a lot of rustic charm. Ideal for a quiet dinner after a day in the mountains.
t3.title: Cozy and full of character
t4.name: David S.
t4.testimonial: The crepes pleasantly surprised us, both sweet and savory. Good value for money.
t4.title: Good food and pleasant atmosphere
